message: Let's be fair and avoid the risk of inflation. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for a quick agreement.
Your share is losing value fast, Alice. Let's split the difference from your offer - 55/45.
I understand the risks of inflation, Bob, but I'm also being fair.  58/42 is my final offer.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm coming down, you're going up - let's settle at 52/48.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm losing money with every round we waste. 56/44 is my absolute bottom line.
Let's stop this nonsense before we both lose out, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution.
